The problem still exists (but better than before)
Testing with tensorflow whl from today's nightly build. 
cuda 8.0.44, ubuntu 16.04. TitanX-Pascal
The output of the snippet I posted originally:
```
0.0230369567871
5.01169514656
5.04840922356
```

Also I've tried the script posted by @poxvoculi , it also shows very bad performance of logical reduce on GPU.
```
dev gpu size 10485760 logical and: 0.076422
dev gpu size 10485760 integer add: 0.403020
dev gpu size 10485760 float32 add: 0.142583
dev gpu size 10485760 logical red: 59.669889
dev gpu size 10485760 integer red: 0.359660
dev gpu size 10485760 float32 red: 0.172168
```
